page.title: 02FAMILY WAKING GRT. LINFORD
page.content: We awake to the sound of the Teasmade making our early morning cup of tea at 7.00 a.m. While the tea is brewing Jen gets up and goes downstairs to take the washing from the washing machine which washes the clothes overnight, and hangs them out to dry (if it is wet the clothes are spread around the heating radiators in the house). Jen then empties the clean dishes from the dishwasher, ready to take today's dishes as they are dirtied. Tea is now brewed, so she tries to drag Craig away from the TV where he is watching Children's Channel courtesy of MKTV. Jen then wakes Wayne and Claire. They all descend upon me, in bed, while I am trying to snatch a few extra minutes sleep. Arguments ensue about who sits where around the tea tray at the side of our bed.
